DOC.brief_summary: Many drug use treatment Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus cause body retain water . This study ass whether GW677954 cause body retain fluid .
DOC.brief_title: A Study To Assess GW677954 Used In Combination With Insulin In Subjects Who Have Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : Have diagnose doctor Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus least 3 month Screening Have body mass index within range 25 40.0kg/m2 inclusive Females meet criterion must physiologically incapable become pregnant ( ie. , surgically sterilize , postmenopausal per protocol definition ) Exclusion criterion : Significant weight loss gain 3 month screen Have use insulin treat hyperglycemia within 3 month screen Have history fluid retention Have uncontrolled high blood pressure Have liver disease Take loop diuretic ( water pill ) , certain blood thinner , and/or St. Johns Wort . Have certain kind cancer
